mapper.sql: ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, ORG_CODE, PARENT_ORG_CODE, REGION_NBR, SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT A.ORG_CODE id,A.PARENT_ORG_CODE pid,A.ORG_NAME name,(select wm_concat(C.POSITION_NAME) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF B, Sys_Position C where C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.POSITION_CODE = C.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE) extField1 FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.PARENT_ORG_CODE IS NULL

SELECT A.ORG_CODE ID,A.PARENT_ORG_CODE PID,A.ORG_NAME NAME, (select wm_concat(C.POSITION_NAME) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF B, Sys_Position C where C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.POSITION_CODE = C.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.PARENT_ORG_CODE=#{id}

SELECT A.ORG_CODE ID,A.PARENT_ORG_CODE PID,A.ORG_NAME NAME,(select wm_concat(C.POSITION_NAME) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF B, Sys_Position C where C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.POSITION_CODE = C.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD=1000 AND A.PARENT_ORG_CODE=#{id}

Select A.* from SYS_ORGANIZATION A where 1=1
AND A.ORG_NAME like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'

SELECT A.ORG_CODE ID, A.PARENT_ORG_CODE PID, A.ORG_NAME name, (select wm_concat(C.POSITION_NAME) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF B, Sys_Position C where C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.POSITION_CODE = C.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM (SELECT * FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000') A START WITH A.ORG_CODE = #{vo.orgCode} CONNECT BY A.ORG_CODE = PRIOR A.PARENT_ORG_CODE

choose.when:
SELECT A.ORG_CODE orgCode, A.PARENT_ORG_CODE parentOrgCode, A.ORG_NAME orgName, (select d.region_name from tb_area_code b, tb_common_region d where b.status_cd = '1000' and d.status_cd = '1000' and b.common_region_id = d.common_region_id and b.area_nbr=A.REGION_NBR) regionName, (select wm_concat(C.POSITION_NAME) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF B, Sys_Position C where C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.POSITION_CODE = C.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE) POSITIONS, A.STATUS_CD statusCd, ( select count(1) from SYS_USER_DEPT_REF f where f.status_cd='1000' and f.org_code=A.ORG_CODE) userNum FROM (SELECT * FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.PARENT_ORG_CODE=#{vo.orgCode}) A where 1=1
AND ORG_NAME like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'
choose.otherwise:
SELECT A.ORG_CODE orgCode, A.PARENT_ORG_CODE parentOrgCode, A.ORG_NAME orgName, (select d.region_name from tb_area_code b, tb_common_region d where b.status_cd = '1000' and d.status_cd = '1000' and b.common_region_id = d.common_region_id and b.area_nbr=A.REGION_NBR) regionName, (select wm_concat(C.POSITION_NAME) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF B, Sys_Position C where C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.POSITION_CODE = C.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE) POSITIONS, A.STATUS_CD statusCd, ( select count(1) from SYS_USER_DEPT_REF f where f.status_cd='1000' and f.org_code=A.ORG_CODE) userNum FROM (SELECT * FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' START WITH A.ORG_CODE = #{vo.orgCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.ORG_CODE = A.PARENT_ORG_CODE) A where 1=1
AND ORG_NAME like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'

mapper.select: select A.Org_Id orgId, A.Org_Name orgName, A.Org_Code orgCode, A.Parent_Org_Code parentOrgCode, A.REGION_NBR regionNbr, A.SORT sort, A.STATUS_CD statusCd from SYS_ORGANIZATION A where A.STATUS_CD=1000 AND A.Org_Code = #{orgCode}
select count(1) from SYS_USER_DEPT_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.org_code=#{orgCode}
select count(1) from SYS_DEPT_ROLE_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.org_code=#{orgCode}
